column5: I managed to film a couple lakers I caught a couple weeks back, so feel free to take a peak.   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zd88miBol9o&feature=plcp
Nice single handed net work dude !!! Looks like you have done that a few times Great looking laker too
I was thinking the same thing. Nice Fish!
Personally I really enjoy trolling for lakers on a flat calm day. Not enough excitement for my son so I don't do it as much anymore.  Thanks for sharing.
